instructions.title: Instructions

items: 1. This is a visual reasoning test.
2. Each LINE follows the same evolution pattern.
3. There are no column or diagonal patterns.
4. Your goal is to draw the missing image on the last line.

footer: To draw, click on the buttons above.

3: 2. You will have 2 minutes to solve each level.
3. You cannot go back after advancing.
4. If you get a hard level, press 'Randomize'.
5. You can refresh as many times as you want!

level.warning: After advancing, you cannot go back!
